item.title: 西南航空正在推出全新的面貌，重新设计的客舱拥有更大的垃圾箱空间、设备支架、电源插座和高级飞机座椅。
item.description:
Southwest is launching a brand new look, with re-designed cabins featuring larger bin space, device holders, power outlets, and premium aircraft seats.

But despite the enhancements, travelers were quick to criticize after noticing one potential flaw. https://t.co/MjrUwRGRix

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周四晚，乔-拜登总统在众议院发表了他的第三次国情咨文演讲，提出了从富人税收到抵押贷款减免和堕胎权利等一系列重要建议。
item.description:
President Joe Biden delivered his third State of the Union address in the House chamber Thursday night, making a number of key proposals, from taxes for the wealthy to mortgage relief and abortion rights.https://t.co/2pRITpr3Ms

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在 #SOTU2024 期间讨论移民问题时被众议员马乔里.泰勒.格林打断，拜登回应说 "我对拉肯.莱利的父母表示同情"，并呼吁通过他的两党移民法案。
item.description:
Pres. Biden was interrupted by Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene as he discussed immigration during #SOTU2024, with Biden responding by saying "my heart goes out to" the parents of Laken Riley and calling for passage of his bipartisan immigration bill. https://t.co/exdukN7RSD pic.twitter.com/YRPbSE0NMm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国当局周四晚间表示，一名美国海军陆战队员的父亲于2021年美国撤出阿富汗时在阿富汗喀布尔机场遇害，他因扰乱国情咨文演讲而被美国国会警察逮捕。
item.description:
The father of a U.S. Marine who was killed at Afghanistan's Kabul airport in 2021 as America pulled out of the country was arrested by U.S. Capitol Police officers for disrupting the State of the Union address, authorities said Thursday night. https://t.co/MJloZt6Jxc pic.twitter.com/zLAb4gmE1k

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在拜登总统周四晚的国情咨文演讲中，民主党妇女核心小组身着白色服装，向 "为生殖权利而战 "致敬。
item.description:
The Democratic Women's Caucus wore white to honor the "fight for reproductive rights" at Pres. Biden's Thursday night State of the Union address.https://t.co/nkC6xKWOk1 pic.twitter.com/pzPkrt2p3x

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国当局周四晚间表示，一名美国海军陆战队员的父亲于2021年美国撤出阿富汗时在阿富汗喀布尔机场遇害，他因扰乱国情咨文演讲而被美国国会警察逮捕。
item.description:
The father of a U.S. Marine who was killed at Afghanistan's Kabul airport in 2021 as America pulled out of the country was arrested by U.S. Capitol Police officers for disrupting the State of the Union address, authorities said Thursday night. https://t.co/xDcI7g5jI4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在周四晚的国情咨文演讲中，乔-拜登总统宣布了一项 "紧急 "军事任务，即在加沙沿岸的地中海建造一个港口，以运送人道主义援助物资。
item.description:
During his State of the Union speech on Thursday night, President Joe Biden announced an "emergency" military mission to construct a port in the Mediterranean Sea on Gaza's coast to get humanitarian aid in.https://t.co/eYYMg4UjqK pic.twitter.com/81xRiUQTgR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在拜登总统的 #SOTU2024 讲话中因大喊大叫而被赶出众议院的男子已被证实是一名海军陆战队员的父亲，这名陆战队员在 2021 年美国撤军期间死于阿富汗喀布尔机场阿比门爆炸事件。
item.description:
The man removed from the House chamber for shouting during Pres Biden's #SOTU2024 is confirmed to be the father of a Marine who was killed in the Abbey Gate bombing at the airport in Kabul, Afghanistan, during the U.S. withdrawal in 2021. https://t.co/A1tsqCmScH pic.twitter.com/KCPNBiR1PA

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 8, 2024

item.title: 英格兰东南部一名 2 岁男孩的父亲分享了一段儿子举重时为他加油的视频，该视频在社交媒体上走红。
item.description:
A 2-year-old boy in southeast England has gone viral on social media after his father shared a video of his son cheering him on as he lifted weights.https://t.co/aIFhUTAxX0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在拜登发言的最后阶段，一名男子在反复大声喊叫后被带离了众议院会议厅的上层区域。这名男子似乎在大喊美国 2021 年撤军期间在喀布尔阿比门爆炸案中丧生的海军陆战队员。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Late into Biden's remarks, a man was removed from the upper area of the House chamber after shouting out repeatedly.

The man appeared to be yelling about the Marines killed in the Abbey Gate bombing in Kabul during the U.S. withdrawal in 2021. https://t.co/L0viTioGar #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/48ShnlGxVA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登发言到很晚的时候，一名男子在反复喊叫后被带离了众议院会议厅的上层区域。这名男子似乎在大喊2021年在阿富汗喀布尔机场阿比门爆炸案中丧生的海军陆战队员的名字。
item.description:
Late into Biden's remarks, a man was removed from the upper area of the House chamber after shouting out repeatedly.

The man appeared to be yelling about the Marines who were killed in the Abbey Gate bombing at the airport in Kabul, Afghanistan in 2021.https://t.co/L0qN9ojBhp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在美国共和党的回应中，参议员凯蒂-布里特（Katie Britt）说，拜登总统的国情咨文是 "一个长期政客的表现，他在位的时间实际上比我在世的时间还长"，"拜登总统就是不明白这一点。他与时代脱节了
item.description:
During the GOP response, Sen. Katie Britt says Pres. Biden’s State of the Union was the “performance of a permanent politician, who has actually been in office for longer than I’ve been alive.”

"Pres. Biden just doesn't get it. He's out of touch." https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu pic.twitter.com/scquw4rTJj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文演讲的最后谈到了他对未来的乐观态度：我看到了一个我们捍卫民主的未来......"。我看到的未来是我们恢复选择权，保护我们的自由，而不是剥夺自由"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden closes his State of the Union address by speaking on his optimism for the future: "I see a future where we are defending democracy ... I see a future where we restore the right to choose and protect our freedoms, not take them away."https://t.co/Cny6OKMN63 pic.twitter.com/Y3E8WiOIGe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统最后谈到了他对美国未来的展望。"他说："最重要的是，我看到了所有美国人的未来。"我看到了一个属于所有美国人的国家。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden closed out his address, speaking to the future he envisions in America. "Above all, I see a future for all Americans," he said. "I see a country for all Americans." https://t.co/xEtuF3lbbY #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/zvMgRgIeqh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在预计将与前总统特朗普展开的漫长的大选斗争之前，拜登总统提出了连任的理由，并将他对国家未来的愿景与共和党人进行了对比：
item.description:
Pres. Biden made his case for a second term and contrasted his vision of the country's future with Republicans ahead of what's expected to be a lengthy general election fight with former Pres. Trump.

Follow live updates: https://t.co/tMu5UMmrQI pic.twitter.com/v4kCOozRvA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: "有人说我太老了。无论年轻还是年老......我都知道我们的北极星美国的根本理念是我们生而平等。拜登总统说："在我们的一生中，我们理应受到平等对待。#SOTU2024
item.description:
“I’ve been told I'm too old. Whether young or old ... I've known our North Star. The very idea of America is that we are all created equal. We deserve to be treated equally throughout our lives,” Pres. Biden says. #SOTU2024 https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu pic.twitter.com/0LSRxE8tSS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登再次呼吁国会进行更严格的枪支改革，包括禁止使用大容量弹夹和突击步枪，同时抨击前总统特朗普。
item.description:
Biden reiterated his call for Congress to enact stricter gun reform, including banning high-capacity magazines and assault rifles — while swiping at former Pres. Trump.https://t.co/WG7wbZzEdM pic.twitter.com/gqR5Cj2OJc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中谈及以色列与哈马斯的战争："当我们展望未来时，唯一真正能解决这一局势的办法就是两国解决方案。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden addresses Israel-Hamas war at the SOTU: "As we look to the future the only real solution to the situation is a two-state solution over time." https://t.co/WLzTMzGuew #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/tQ3oBbRrdU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 哈里斯副总统起立为拜登总统鼓掌，拜登承认她是美国第一位女副总统。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Vice Pres. Harris gives Pres. Biden a standing ovation as Biden acknowledges her as the first female vice president of the United States. https://t.co/xEtuF3lbbY #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/zs2XC2huAn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在谈到美国校园枪击案时，要求禁止攻击性武器和大容量弹夹："通过普遍的背景调查。这一切都不会违反第二修正案"。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden, while addressing school shootings in America, demands a ban on assault weapons and high-capacity magazines: "Pass universal background checks. None of this violates the Second Amendment." https://t.co/WLzTMzGuew #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/mhJOUmVAQx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在谈到他的新移民法案时说："这项法案将拯救生命。它还将授权总统在边境移民人数过多时关闭边境"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden speaks on his new immigration bill saying, "this bill would save lives. It would also give the president the authority to shut down the border when the migrants at the border is overwhelming."https://t.co/KMuedV708y pic.twitter.com/tIpVe2HRZK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中讨论移民问题时被众议员马乔里-泰勒-格林（Marjorie Taylor Greene）打断，拜登回应说 "我对拉肯-莱利（Laken Riley）的父母表示同情"，并呼吁通过两党移民法案。
item.description:
Pres. Biden is interrupted by Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene as he discusses immigration during his State of the Union, with Biden responding by saying "my heart goes out to" the parents of Laken Riley and calling for passage of bipartisan immigration bill. https://t.co/xEtuF3lbbY pic.twitter.com/ltQA6RbCpr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登敦促立法者 "再次达成一致，为老年人挺身而出"，同时呼吁保护社会保障。
item.description:
Biden urged lawmakers to "all agree once again to stand up for seniors" while calling for Social Security protections.https://t.co/YJl56x6fmc pic.twitter.com/NigCYe3PmE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在SOTU："我想保护基本权利。通过《平等法案》。我想告诉美国变性人：我支持你们。" #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden at SOTU: "I want to protect fundamental rights. Pass The Equality Act. And my message to transgender Americans: I have your back." https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/Pb5NsuDOwe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统提议将亿万富翁的最低联邦税率定为 25%，他声称这将在未来 10 年内筹集 5000 亿美元："亿万富翁缴纳的联邦税率不应低于教师、环卫工人或护士。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden proposes a minimum federal tax rate for billionaires at 25%, which he claims would raise $500 billion over the next 10 years: "No billionaire should pay a lower federal tax rate than a teacher, a sanitation worker or a nurse." https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/G2799YXS72

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统宣布第一夫人吉尔-拜登（Jill Biden）将发起白宫首个妇女健康研究倡议。"妇女占我们人口的一半以上，但有关妇女健康的研究一直资金不足。
item.description:
Pres. Biden announces that First Lady Jill Biden will launch the first White House initiative on women’s health research.

“Women are more than half our population, but research on women’s health has always been underfunded.”https://t.co/QrubIFcQ2W pic.twitter.com/3dpJ0ge6ON

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统宣布第一夫人吉尔-拜登（Jill Biden）将发起白宫有史以来第一项关于妇女健康研究的倡议。"妇女占我国人口的一半以上，但有关妇女健康的研究一直资金不足。#SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden announces that first Lady Jill Biden will launch the first ever White House initiative on women’s health research.

“Women are more than half our population, but research on women’s health has always been underfunded.” #SOTU2024 https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu pic.twitter.com/8PzvUzBHPh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中谈到美国的 "未来 "时说，他希望美国 "涓滴经济的时代结束，富人和最大的公司不再获得所有税收减免"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden talks about the "future" of America in his State of the Union address, saying he wants a country "where the days of trickle-down economics are over, and the wealthy and the biggest corporations no longer get all the tax breaks."https://t.co/sEu9ROhlbW pic.twitter.com/Q5k08RYYcx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统斥责那些投票反对《两党基础设施法》的共和党人 现在却 "为钱的到来而欢呼""如果你们中有人不希望这些钱进入你们的选区 请告诉我"#SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden calls out Republicans who voted against the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law but are now “cheering on the money coming on.”

“If any of you don’t want that money in your district, just let me know.” #SOTU2024 https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu pic.twitter.com/UgLVxe760S

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统："我要对美国人民说：当美国被击倒时，我们会重新站起来。我们继续前进。这就是美国......今晚，我们可以骄傲地说，我们的联邦国家很强大，而且越来越强大。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden: "I say to the American people: when America gets knocked down, we get back up. We keep going. That's America...Tonight we can proudly say the state of our union is strong and getting stronger." https://t.co/meOdcxP5qp #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/YPPPl4nIYb

— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) March 8, 2024
